feed.title: BigBlueButton Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: BigBlueButton 2.7.4
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains several security patches including in BigBlueButton itself, in FreeSWITCH and some other libraries. Additionally cursor and zoom control were improved. We recommend you upgrade as the FreeSWITCH advisory is already public. The two BigBlueButton advisories listed in the release notes will be published not earlier than the end of January 2024.

We have included a first version of integration with gladia.io for closed captions. BigBlueButton is adding support for Gladia as a closed captions provider. There is initial documentation for the integration here. Expect more updates and documentation in this area.

We thank the French Ministry of Education and Dinum who have supported the development of the integration with https://www.gladia.io/, an AI driven speech-to-text service for live transcriptions. (In French) Le projet BigBlueButton souhaite remercier le ministère français de l' Education Nationale et la Dinum, qui a directement contribué au développement de cette version en finançant de nouvelles fonctionnalités.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

newly added: * feat: Initial implementation of Gladia transcriptions to BBB 2.7 by @lfzawacki in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19091 * feat: labelless leave meeting button with dropdown selection for Leave/End by @Ithanil in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19232 * feat: join param for default animations setting value by @ramonlsouza in #19434

fixes * fix: Add Transitions To Improve Cursor Movement Fluidity by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19127 * fix: Improve Wheel Zoom Stability by @KDSBrowne in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19383 * upgrade tooltip dependency and fix open tooltip on mobile by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19114 * fix (backport): Button 'Open Tablet app' breaks when the meeting name contains white space by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19206 * [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.6.0 to 1.6.3 html5 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19366 * [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.6.3 to 1.6.4 bbb-html5 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19395 * fix(chat): exported presentation notification by @Arthurk12 in #19281 * fix: away and raiseHands 'reactions' being hidden by avatar image by @Ithanil in #19266

test * test: Removing flaky flags by @gabriellpr in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19101 * test:[Snyk] upgrade axios from 1.6.0 to 1.6.3 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19364 * test: [Snyk] upgrade axios from 1.6.3 to 1.6.4 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19394 * test: [Snyk] upgrade axios from 1.6.0 to 1.6.4 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19392

localization * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ja by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19111 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fa_IR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19163 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fr by @transifex-integration in #19188 #19322 #19342 #19345 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language tr by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19198 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language eu by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19202 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language es by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19211 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language es_ES by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19212 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ru by @transifex-integration in #19214 #19255 #19270 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ar by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19272 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language uk_UA by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19373 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language et by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19375 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ko_KR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19350

build and configuration

  • build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.12.1 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19119
  • build(bbb-webrtc-recorder): v0.5.2 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19315
  • build(sec): upgrade FreeSWITCH to 1.10.11 +sofia-sip +libks by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19377

Core

  • fix(sec): validate URL for external upload of presentation https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/commit/fd8c92714092b937dc1f099d2e9d0a72985cb738 security advisory will be published not earlier than Jan 31, 2024 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/security/advisories/GHSA-j42p-fh2w-24q6
  • fix(sec): filter tags in presentation name https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/commit/59cdb136ad29859a3b6817ae56e83f057d44cf38 security advisory will be published not earlier than Jan 31, 2024 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/security/advisories/GHSA-r3vv-c788-9fph
  • chore: Upgrade Grails to 6.1 by @paultrudel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19193
  • fix: Bump spring-boot-starter-validation to 2.7.17 to match bbb-web by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19385

bbb-exports-annotations

  • [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 0.26.0 to 1.6.4 bbb-export-annotations by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19389

bbb-etherpad

  • fix: Bump Etherpad's export rate limiting (2.7) by @danielpetri1 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19132

bbb-recording-imex

  • [Snyk] Fix for 2 vulnerabilities by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19249
  • [Snyk] Fix for 2 vulnerabilities by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19277

Docs

  • docs: Docs backport by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19204
  • Greenlight v3 docs: More cleanup and reorg by @farhatahmad in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19205
  • docs: comply to MDX v3 (stricter markdown) by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19285
  • docs: use npm only - drop yarn [2.7 portion] by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19299
  • docs: updated greenlight docs to include user:set_admin_role rake task by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19311
  • Update bbb-conf.md - fix typo in word 'easi' by @tbird20d in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/18890
  • doc: what's new in 2.7 link not proper by @srikantharika in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19166

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.3...v2.7.4

New Contributors

  • @tbird20d made their first contribution in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/18890
  • @srikantharika made their first contribution in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19166

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.4.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 226

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: BigBlueButton 2.6.16
entry.content:
This 2.6 iteration contains multiple backports from BigBlueButton 2.7 including several security patches including in BigBlueButton itself, in FreeSWITCH and some other libraries. We recommend you upgrade as the FreeSWITCH advisory is already public. The two BigBlueButton advisories listed in the release notes will be published not earlier than the end of January 2024.

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.6/new

Big THANK YOU to all community members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

  • fix(chat): exported presentation notification (backport to 2.6) by @Arthurk12 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19280
  • [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.6.0 to 1.6.3 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19362
  • [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.6.3 to 1.6.4 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19393
  • Updates for file bigbluebutton-html5/public/locales/en.json in ar by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19318
  • Updates for file bigbluebutton-html5/public/locales/en.json in de by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19432
  • Updates for file bigbluebutton-html5/public/locales/en.json in fr by @transifex-integration #19453

build and configuration

  • build(sec): upgrade FreeSWITCH to 1.10.11 +sofia-sip +libks by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19379

Core

  • fix(sec) validate URL for external upload of presentation (backport to 2.6) https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/commit/13657f1e6c988d717194f931e3bd16ea38d94b7b security advisory will be published not earlier than Jan 31, 2024 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/security/advisories/GHSA-j42p-fh2w-24q6
  • fix(sec): filter tags in presentation name (backport to 2.6) https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/commit/08c838703793ac969e442d07486ff16e991ed40a security advisory will be published not earlier than Jan 31, 2024 https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/security/advisories/GHSA-r3vv-c788-9fph

export-annotations

  • [Snyk] Security upgrade axios from 1.6.0 to 1.6.4 export-annotations by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19391

documentation

  • docs: comply to MDX v3 (stricter markdown) by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19284
  • docs: use npm only - drop yarn [2.6 portion] by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19298

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.6.15...v2.6.16

Release name

Passing -v focal-260 to bbb-install-2.6.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.6 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-260-2.6.16.

We still recommend using -v focal-260 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.6 release.

Client build: 711

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.6.17
entry.content:
This 2.6 iteration introduces a bbb-apps-akka property needed for certain configuration where the checksum algorithm is overriden. With this property breakout rooms can be used again. The latest locale changes have also been included. We also updated a couple dependencies tagged as containing vulnerabilities.

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.6/new

Big THANK YOU to all community members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

  • [Snyk] Security upgrade sanitize-html from 2.7.1 to 2.12.1 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19677
  • Updates for file bigbluebutton-html5/public/locales/en.json in ar by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19570
  • Updates for file bigbluebutton-html5/public/locales/en.json in hu_HU by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19566
  • Updates for file bigbluebutton-html5/public/locales/en.json in fa_IR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19552
  • Updates for file bigbluebutton-html5/public/locales/en.json in tr by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19499
  • Updates for file bigbluebutton-html5/public/locales/en.json in ru by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19685

Core

  • feat(config): add checkSumAlgorithmForBreakouts in akka-apps by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19743
  • fix(sec): bump postgresql to 42.7.2 (backport) by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19662

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.6.16...v2.6.17

Release name

Passing -v focal-260 to bbb-install-2.6.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.6 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-260-2.6.17.

We still recommend using -v focal-260 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.6 release.

Client build: 715

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.5
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains fixes to several components.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * fix(bbb-html5): customHeartbeat would not close stale sessions, + by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19017 * refactor: End meeting button tweaks by @Ithanil in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19261 * fix: Drop heavy log from sendBulkAnnotations.js by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19633 * [Snyk] Security upgrade sanitize-html from 2.7.1 to 2.12.1 by @jfederico in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19678 * fix(layout): defaultLayout join parameter by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19616 * refactor: Changes to layout toast's workflow by @Scroody in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/18762 * fix: Incorrect hover style on the upload presentation button in the polling menu (2.7) by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19538 * fix: Upload the exported users list to presentation breaks the whiteboard by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19557 * fix: Download presentation popup window is broken by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19734 * fix(bbb-html5): Use CDN for resource of layouts by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19755 * fix: Avoid presentation conversion causing a crash by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19600 * Fix: Modal of the inactivity inspection does not show up by @Scroody in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19609

test * test: update playwright tests to support sha256 and sha512 algorithms by @paulseto in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19725

localization * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language sv_SE by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19469 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language hu_HU by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19565 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fr by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19525 #19594 #19740 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language nb_NO by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19613 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language lt_LT by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19492 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language pt by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19671

build and configuration

  • [2.7] build(bbb-webrtc-recorder): v0.6.0 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19459
  • build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.12.2 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19460
  • Unset all local variables by @ffdixon in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19602
  • build(export-annotations): Add dependency poppler-utils by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19758

Core

  • feat(config): add checkSumAlgorithmForBreakouts in akka-apps (port) by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19754
  • fix(sec): bump postgresql to 42.7.2 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19660
  • Fix (akka-apps) (2.7): Config from /etc not being read when running through sbt reStart by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19757
  • fix: Reduce logs in SendWhiteboardAnnotationPubMsgHdlr.scala by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19634
  • !fix(captions): disable recording event TranscriptUpdatedEvent by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19762
  • fix: Several Gladia transcription fixes by @lfzawacki in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19608
  • feat: Record raiseHand, away and Reaction events (backport) by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19642

Recording processing

  • recording: work around invalid locale in caption events by @kepstin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19597

Export annotations

  • fix(bbb-export-annotations): handle missing textbox size in Tldraw by @danielpetri1 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19672

Learning Analytics Dashboard

  • feat(config): Add option to disabled "Download session data" on Learning Dashboard (backport) by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19641

Docs

  • docs: Close code block in customize md by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19588
  • docs: Tweaks to gladia io docs by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19438
  • docs: capitalize Support title by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19658
  • docs: drop old links #18295 from wilkis3/wilkis3-doc-admin-install-links (backport) by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19759
  • docs: Update FreeSWITCH configs - Nine digits PIN by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19760

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.4...v2.7.5

New Contributors

  • @paulseto made their first contribution in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19725

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.5.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 243

entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v2.7.6
entry.content:
This iteration of BigBlueButton 2.7 contains several localization updates and newer versions of bbb-webrtc-sfu and -recorder.

We welcome any feedback about this release on our bigbluebutton-dev mailing list

Note that BigBlueButton 2.7 runs on Ubuntu Focal (20.04).

Link to installation command / instructions / features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/2.7/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all comminuty members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * fix(locale): Remove duplicate localization row by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19768 * fix(client): undefined currentUserAway by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19774

localization * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language el_GR by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19821 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language fr by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19810 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ar by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19770 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language de by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19771 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v2.7 HTML5 client and language ja by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19780

build and configuration

  • [2.7] build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.13.2 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19801
  • [2.7] build(bbb-webrtc-recorder): v0.7.0 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19803
  • [2.7] build(bbb-webrtc-sfu): v2.13.3 by @prlanzarin in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/19848

Docs

  • bash script reads /etc/turnserver.conf to get realm and secret. by @debuglevel in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/18184

New Contributors

  • @debuglevel made their first contribution in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/18184

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v2.7.5...v2.7.6

Release name

Passing -v focal-270 to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/v2.7.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 2.7 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v focal-270-2.7.6.

We still recommend using -v focal-270 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 2.7 release.

Client build: 249
